/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A bridge arches over the street, connecting two parts of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
